articles.title: Trump stirs talk of ‘new world order’ as leaders signal shifting global alliances

articles.title: Fire guts north Edmonton home, neighbours say 4th time in a month
articles.description: A north Edmonton home is now fully boarded up in the Montrose neighbourhood after a fire Friday morning. Neighbours CityNews spoke to say this was not the first time firefighters have been to that home this month. Fire crews arrived to an active fire at a single residential home just after 8.30 a.m.

articles.title: Ancient giant kangaroos could hop after all
articles.description: Giant kangaroos that lived during the Ice Age may not have been as slow and grounded as once believed.
